post:
We are happy to announce that we've launched KVM VPS in Osaka, Japan DC, and we bring a KVM offer in Japan.

- 1 CPU
- 512MB RAM
- 20GB HDD
- 1 IP
- 400GB Traffic
- 100Mbps Port Speed
- Coupon: **Osaka**
- $7 / Month

Order Now: https://my.starrydns.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=490

Test IP / Looking Glass:

- Osaka, Japan: http://jp2.lg.starrydns.com/
- Tokyo, Japan: http://jp1.lg.starrydns.com/

Payment: We currently accept Paypal only, and we will add other gateways in near future.

Set up time: Manual review is required for customers who currently don't have active service, which can take up to 24 hours during business day.

Refund policy: We offer 3-day money back guarantee, please refer to https://www.starrydns.com/en/refund-policy to read more.

ToS and AUP can be found at https://www.starrydns.com/en/tos and https://www.starrydns.com/en/aup

Thank you.
